{
  "questionNumber": 24,
  "solution": [
    "We are given the sequence \\( \\{a_n\\} \\) satisfying the following conditions:",
    "1. \\( a_1 = a_2 + 3 \\)",
    "2. \\( a_{n+1} = -2a_n \\) for \\( n \\geq 1 \\).",
    "First, from the recurrence relation, starting with \\( n = 1 \\):",
    "\\( a_2 = -2a_1 \\).",
    "Substitute \\( a_2 \\) into the first condition:",
    "\\( a_1 = (-2a_1) + 3 \\).",
    "Simplify the equation:",
    "\\( a_1 = -2a_1 + 3 \\).",
    "Add \\( 2a_1 \\) to both sides:",
    "\\( a_1 + 2a_1 = 3 \\).",
    "Combine like terms:",
    "\\( 3a_1 = 3 \\).",
    "Divide both sides by 3:",
    "\\( a_1 = 1 \\).",
    "Now compute subsequent terms using the recurrence relation:",
    "\\( a_2 = -2a_1 = -2 \\times 1 = -2 \\).",
    "\\( a_3 = -2a_2 = -2 \\times (-2) = 4 \\).",
    "\\( a_4 = -2a_3 = -2 \\times 4 = -8 \\).",
    "\\( a_5 = -2a_4 = -2 \\times (-8) = 16 \\).",
    "\\( a_6 = -2a_5 = -2 \\times 16 = -32 \\).",
    "\\( a_7 = -2a_6 = -2 \\times (-32) = 64 \\).",
    "\\( a_8 = -2a_7 = -2 \\times 64 = -128 \\).",
    "\\( a_9 = -2a_8 = -2 \\times (-128) = 256 \\).",
    "Therefore, the value of \\( a_9 \\) is \\( \\boxed{256} \\)."
  ],
  "answer": "\\boxed{256}"
}
